page.title: 16The Port of Boston Docks
page.content: Boston dock has just had a new crane. The crane can lift 45 tonnes and it weighs 80 tonnes.The crane was built in Boston docks itself.The parts of the crane came from Stoke-on-Trent.The dock is now the most commonly used in Lincolnshire and is modernising very quickly.The main cargo which is imported is timber,coal,cows,steel and potatoes.The main exports are grain,steel,coal and coke.The port and harbour of Boston is also responsible for maintenance of the Channel ,quays,mooring,bouys,jetties,beacons and lights.There is a dredger which dredges the river where ships have come in to stop.It sucks the silt up which would stop the ships coming in or out.
